name: places/ChIJ5_iMBffzwokRxicHvNyc-CE
adrFormatAddress: 4915 Broadway #2m, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text: Our daughter attended Little Jewel from 9 months old to 2 and a half years old, and she absolutely loved it. From day one they took fantastic care of her, and by the end of our time there my wife and I felt that we had gained a group of new family members (the women that work at Little Jewel as well as the parents of other children). Do you want to drop your child off in the morning knowing that they will be taken care of and loved? Send them to Little Jewel.

originalText.text: I love Little Jewel because it was an extended family for my girl. It was very important for me that when she was away from her parents she felt loved and happy besides being well cared and educated. There was never a day that she didn’t want to go to daycare. She learned so much, that I was kinda amazed that she knew letters and numbers in Spanish and English... I am very grateful for the staff and the owner for making my life at work so much easier because I knew that my girl was happy. I couldn’t have found a better place for her.

originalText.text: We were planning on moving out of Inwood until we found Little Jewel.  We could not be happier because our children could not be happier.  We have so much trust in the care that Cindy and Juby provide for our two children (we started there when our son was 2 years old and our daughter was 4 months old).  They bake together, they do art together, they take nature walks, they provide a bi lingual experience, they read to the children, all of the materials and environs are gorgeous.  They communicate with us on a daily basis, and the community of families there are wonderful, friendly and active. This is a brilliant childcare center!

We have so much trust in the care that Cindy and Juby provide for our two children (we started there when our son was 2 years old and our daughter was 4 months old). They communicate with us on a daily basis, and the community of families there are wonderful, friendly and active. This is a brilliant childcare center!

originalText.text:
A true Inwood treasure!

Definitely one of the best (if not the best) daycare in Inwood! I hear friends complaining of their children crying during daycare drop off...but I've NEVER seen that at little jewels. Our little one is always so happy and giggly when she sees the care providers, and I've never seen any of her friends cry during drop off.

Very meticulous, clean, caring, and everyone there clearly loves what they do. As an educator, I am impressed by their interactive curriculum: In addition to free play, they take the kids to the park everyday (weather permitting), they do yoga (yes our daughter can do her version of down-dog and plank at 7 months!), sing, teach sign language, read stories on a daily basis, arts and crafts and don't fetter to communicate any issues they notice with our child.

Thank you little Jewels, you guys are the best!
